detail_desc: Waistcoat in woven fabric with buttons down the front, fake front pockets and an adjustable tab at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and an extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets, fake jetted pockets with a button at the back, and straight legs with creases down the front.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and an extended waistband with a hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets, fake jetted pockets with a button at the back, and straight legs with creases down the front.
Wide T-shirt dress in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the back, patch pockets on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Fitted top in transparent, printed, stretch mesh with a small stand-up collar, visible seams and long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.

Ankle-length trousers in a Tencel™ lyocell-blend weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and a regular waist. Straight, gently tapering legs with contrasting-colour stripes with press-studs down the sides.
Ankle-length trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and straight legs with creases and visible zips at the hems.
Double-layered scarf in a soft jacquard knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 20x140 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.

Shorts in airy cotton with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded parka in woven fabric with embroidery and appliqués on the front and a detachable, lined hood. Wind flap with press-studs and a zip down the front, flap side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Lined.
Jacket in coloured denim with worn details, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides of the hem and buttons at the cuffs.
Double-layered jersey hats in a soft cotton blend.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and chest pocket. Raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
All-in-one suit in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and chest pocket. Raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Padded bomber jacket with a print motif on the back and embroidered appliqué on the front. Detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, a small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped arm pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket with a print motif on the back and embroidered appliqué on the front. Detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, a small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped arm pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Padded bomber jacket with a print motif on the back and embroidered appliqué on the front. Detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric, a small ribbed stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, zipped arm pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in soft pile with an embroidered motif at the top, jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Front pockets with an embroidered motif, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Jacket in soft pile with an embroidered motif at the top, jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Front pockets with an embroidered motif, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a faux fur pompom at the top. Jersey lining.

Parka in washed cotton twill with an appliqué, detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt chest pocket, flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with an appliqué, detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt chest pocket, flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Parka in washed cotton twill with an appliqué, detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front. Welt chest pocket, flap patch front pockets with a hook and loop fastening and a drawstring at the waist. Elasticated cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip at the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, quilted sections, zipped side pockets and fake tabs at the sides. Lined.

Bomber jacket in satin with appliqués on the front, back and sleeves, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Long viscose twill parka with a detachable, lined hood in sweatshirt fabric. Small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and a drawstring at the waist. Flap chest pockets, patch front pockets with a flap, ribbed cuffs and an elasticated hem.
Jacket in cotton twill with worn details. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, pockets at the hem and buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
